title: Bring Back the Attributes Tab in IE11 F12 Tool - like it was in preious versions
body:
I'm using the re-designed IE.11 F12 Developers Tools.
In the past I have mostly used to tool to grab attribute details.
Such as '.id', .text, .href, as well as read only attributes or properties.
All of these which were lifted from the html and represented on the right hand window in an easy to read list of names & values.
